title: The Brave Little Ant
story: An ant wanted to climb a tall tree. She fell but tried again and again. Finally, she reached the top. Her friends cheered her courage. She felt proud of herself.

title: Leo and the Lost Balloon
story: Leo let go of his red balloon. It floated high into the sky. He felt sad but found a new balloon. He learned to enjoy little things. He smiled and played happily.

title: The Kind Elephant
story: An elephant saw a small bird in rain. He gave it shelter under his ear. The bird sang sweet songs in return. They became best friends. They played together every day.

title: Mia’s Magic Garden
story: Mia planted seeds in her small garden. She watered them every day with care. Soon flowers bloomed everywhere. Her garden made everyone happy. She enjoyed the colorful flowers.

title: Timmy and the Star
story: Timmy wished to catch a star. He climbed the hill but missed it. He saw the stars twinkle above anyway. He smiled and made another wish. He felt happy under the night sky.

title: The Honest Fox
story: A fox found a lost bag of nuts. He returned it to the squirrel. The squirrel thanked him with more nuts. Fox felt proud of doing the right thing. He learned honesty is the best policy.

title: Bella’s Rainbow
story: Bella painted a rainbow in the sky. It made everyone in town smile. Her friends joined and painted too. The sky became full of colors. Everyone enjoyed the colorful view.

title: The Lazy Turtle
story: A turtle slept while others played. He missed the fun and learning. He decided to join the next day. He discovered new friends and games. He enjoyed playing with everyone.

title: Sammy and the Lost Shoe
story: Sammy lost one shoe on his way home. He searched everywhere with patience. He finally found it under a tree. He learned to be careful next time. He wore both shoes happily.

title: The Little Cloud
story: A cloud wanted to be big and white. He worked hard to gather water. Soon, he rained gently on the flowers. The earth smiled with colorful blooms. He felt proud of helping everyone.
